translations: v．雀跃，欢蹦乱跳：轻快地跳跃或玩耍，通常表示高兴或兴奋。
· The children were capering around the room.
孩子们在房间里欢蹦乱跳。

sentences.sentence: There are many lambs capering on the meadow.
sentences.translation: 很多小羊在草地上蹦蹦跳跳。

sentences.sentence: There are many lambs capering in the meadow.
